summary: Comprehensive testing of SoundMirror visual speech articulation training platform completed successfully. All major features are working correctly including Gemini AI grading integration, dual head animations, Progress Tracker, and recording functionality.

History page Progress tab displays day streak, total sessions, avg visual/audio scores
